title: Notice (2) $$=$$ $$-2(1)$$, so we only need to work with (1) and (3). Solve for $$x$$ from (3) and plug $$x$$ into (1), solve for $$y$$ and call this equation (4).
Plug $$y$$ back into $$x$$, call this equation (5). Notice that $$z$$ is free (there are infinitely many solutions for $$z$$, so choose $$z$$ $$=$$ t).
